message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this unique item.
I understand your perspective, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $16000. This is my best offer within my budget.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $16000. I'm willing to consider $17500, which is a bit closer to my target price. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair deal for both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I respect your position on the value of the product. I am willing to go up to $17000 for it. I hope this brings us closer to a mutually agreeable price.

I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $17000, but I need to make a bit more to make it worth my while. I'm thinking $18000 is a fair price for this product. Let me know if that's something you'd be willing to consider.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Given the current negotiations, I would like to propose a final offer of $17500 for the product. I believe this strikes a good balance between our respective positions.
